CustomField.formula: IF(Call_List__r.RecordType.Name=='Collection AMFS' && (TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Lapse Konven' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Renewal Reminder' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'MKP' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Cuti Premi' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'RTU' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Lapse TM') && TEXT(Call_Status_Config__c)== 'Uncontacted', APE_Convert__c ,0)
CustomField.label: Amount Uncontacted
